examples.example: 他一直坚守着对她的承诺，用心呵护着他们的爱情。

translate.english: He has always adhered to his promise to her and carefully cared for their love.

examples.example: 他郑重地做出承诺，一定会努力实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: He solemnly made a promise that he would definitely strive to fulfill his dream.

examples.example: 他向父母承诺会努力工作，让他们过上幸福的生活。

translate.english: He promised to his parents that he would work hard to let them live a happy life.
